trans-unit.source: Defines the metadata attribute that specifies how an ASP.NET server control property or event is persisted to an ASP.NET page at design time.
trans-unit.target: 定義中繼資料 (Metadata) 屬性，該屬性會指定 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項屬性或事件在設計階段保存至 ASP.NET 網頁的方式。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The Web page designer in Visual Studio does not support the `ResetPropertyName` method that is optionally exposed by Windows Forms controls for property persistence.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 中的 Web 網頁設計工具不支援`ResetPropertyName`選擇性由 Windows Form 控制項的屬性持續性的方法。

trans-unit.source: Server controls are serialized using methods provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister> class.
trans-unit.target: 會使用所提供的方法 」 來序列化 「 伺服器控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister>類別。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of these methods is driven by metadata attributes such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法的實作由所驅動的中繼資料屬性例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>， <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceMode" /> value to assign to <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Mode" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceMode" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Mode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mode" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the property or event persists in the opening tag of the server control as an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性 (Property) 或事件在伺服器控制項的開頭標記中保存為屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default type for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> 類別的預設型別。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="PersistenceMode.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="PersistenceMode.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property is HTML-encoded and persists as the only inner content of the ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性以 HTML 編碼，並且保存為 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的唯一內部內容。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 要相比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> object against another object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> 物件與另一個個物件相比較。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are considered equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件可視為相等則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Equals%2A> method first compares the current object with the given object and returns `true` if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Equals%2A>方法先比較目前物件與指定的物件，並傳回`true`兩者是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the given object is also a <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute> object and is not `null`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Mode%2A> properties of each object are compared for equality and the result returned.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果指定的物件也是<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>物件，並不是`null`、<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Mode%2A>相等比較的每個物件的屬性，並傳回的結果。

trans-unit.source: Provides a hash value for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> 屬性的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The hash value to be assigned to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> 的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property persists as the only inner content of the ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性保存為 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的唯一內部內容。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the property persists as a nested tag within the opening and closing tags of the server control.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性保存為伺服器控制項的開頭和結尾標記中的巢狀標記。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> object is of the default type.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> 物件是否屬於預設類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> is of the default type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute" /> 屬於預設類型則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method performs calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Equals%2A> method while passing in the object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Default> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會執行呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Equals%2A>方法時所參考的物件，傳遞<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute.Default>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceMode" /> 列舉型別的目前值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceMode" /> that represents the current value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistenceMode" />，表示列舉型別的目前值。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="Attribute" />, <see langword="InnerProperty" />, <see langword="InnerDefaultProperty" />, or <see langword="EncodedInnerDefaultProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="Attribute" />、<see langword="InnerProperty" />、<see langword="InnerDefaultProperty" /> 或 <see langword="EncodedInnerDefaultProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Attribute" />。
